App Version Final Version 
 
Team Member: Yifeng Yu, Cole Howard, Yo-Han Kang, Jonah Yamato, Yong Shin 
 
What new about the current version: 
1. You can check the memory usage in the setting page. 
2. You can share the app by clicking the sharing icon in the map page. 
3. You can check the weather condition in the top of the news page. 
4. You can send the notification to yourself in the setting page 
5. You can go to the tracking page to check your location history by clicking on the calendar.
